history.proof: intros x. unfold Cmod. simpl. qsimpl time: 1 use: sin_antisym. qsimpl time: 1 use: cos_sym,sin_antisym. qsimpl time: 1 use: cos_sym,Rsqr_sqrt,sin_antisym. rewrite Rplus_comm. scongruence use: Rsqr_neg, Rplus_comm, Rmult_1_r unfold: Rsqr, fst, C, snd.

exceptions.exn: The LHS of sin_antisym (sin (- _)) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of cos_sym (cos _) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of Rsqr_sqrt (sqrt _)² does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment H3 : forall x : R, sin (- x) = (- sin x)%R H2 : forall x : R, 0 <= x -> (sqrt x)² = x H : forall x : R, cos x = cos (- x) x : C Unable to unify "sqrt (fst x * (fst x * 1) + snd x * (snd x * 1))" with "sqrt (- snd x * (- snd x * 1) + - fst x * (- fst x * 1))".

original: intros x. unfold Cmod. unfold Cmod. simpl. rewrite sin_antisym. rewrite cos_sym. rewrite Rsqr_sqrt. rewrite Rplus_comm. reflexivity.
